name: manualxml
short_description:
Ok guys this is a simple project. How many times in a day do you want to get XML parsed. Let me guess a lot of times. As you know there are a lot of parsers that automatically do that. However my emp***er decided that it would be cool and fun if I manually sat and generated/parsed xml. First it was bad but now i totally get it... THIS IS AWESOME... So i decided why not do this for the whole world. ALl u have to do is

1. Email me XML and wait
2. In about a week I will parse the xml and email back simple :)

SPECIAL FEATURE: NATURAL LANGUAGE PROCESSING make spelling mistakes and I will get it :)

Pls comment below, I love this s***
